name: Survive the Emo 3
description:
Survive the Emo 3 is a cartoony top-down shooter filled with creative enemies

A new artificial species has been multiplying throughout the world. With most of the human population taken to these Stvardecendeds (nicknamed Emo) you and your friend Lin set out to destroy the Emo empire. Emo Co will do everything in their power to stop you.
   These Emo each have different powers. There's a Bomb Emo, a Necromancer Emo, a Cloner Emo, and many more for you to encounter. The Emo look almost identical to some of your friends who have recently gone missing. Don't let that fool you! The Emo have been proven to be clones. They are almost certainly insentient.

Soundtrack

Play on Scratch to compete for the global highscore

Play on Gamejolt

Please report bugs in comments
